具.definition: tool; device; utensil; equipment; instrument; talent; ability; to possess; to have; to provide; to furnish; to state; classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

具保.definition: to find guarantor; to find surety

具備.definition: to possess; to have; equipped with; able to fulfill (conditions or requirements)

具名.definition: to sign; to put one's name to

具結.definition: to bind over (as surety); to sign an undertaking

具體到.definition: to embody into; to apply to; to take the shape of; specific to

具體計劃.definition: a concrete plan; a definite plan
